description: This course introduces the history, definitions, predictors, measurement, and outcomes of self-care in chronic illness. Historical, classic and current literature from various disciplines will be studied to give students a broadened perspective of the self-care construct and the issues that patients face when dealing with chronic illness.
name: PRO SEMINAR IN TRANSITIONS: SELF-CARE OF CHRONIC ILLNESS

section.name: PRO SEMINAR IN TRANSITIONS: SELF-CARE OF CHRONIC ILLNESS
